message: This game doesn't have a very high profile yet, but it looks very promising: http://www.viddler.com/explore/Joystiq/videos/5701/
That looks promising, worth keeping an eye on.
I *know* ZAnimus is going to be all over that mage combat.
I was going to say it looks like Fable then I watched the 2nd part of the video. Looking great!
